plot: In the late summer of 1955, Hollywood star Cynthia Beckley has everything. But when her estranged sister dies, Cynthia's long buried secrets threaten to reappear and destroy her perfect world forever.
title: Daughter of Fortune
plot_es: In the late summer of 1955, Hollywood star Cynthia Beckley has everything. But when her estranged sister dies, Cynthia's long buried secrets threaten to reappear and destroy her perfect world forever.
plot_en: In the late summer of 1955, Hollywood star Cynthia Beckley has everything. But when her estranged sister dies, Cynthia's long buried secrets threaten to reappear and destroy her perfect world forever.
